message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I think it would be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay closer to $8,000. What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your position, but $8,000 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $11,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you moving closer on the price.  To be honest, $10,000 is the very highest I can go.  If you're willing to make that work, I'm ready to buy today.
